title: Lemon Basil Pasta Salad
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and rinse with cold water, and set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and salt and pepper. Set aside.
Place pasta in a large bowl, and add peas, zucchini, pine nuts, parmesan, lemon zest, and basil.
Pour dressing over and toss to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. Enjoy!
